A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've never posted before\, but I love Star Wars too much not to comment on this train wreck of a movie. There are too many individual problems to comment on them all and others have spoken eloquently. I will summarize by saying that this was the worst Star Wars movie I have ever seen. Rian Johnson clearly had no respect for JJ Abrams story or George Lucas' characters nor did he give a damn about what fans of the saga. Not to mention he was a terrible writer in his own right and the movie had glaring plot holes\, cringe worthy humor and terrible pacing. I love both Disney and Star Wars in general. Not right now\, epic fail Disney\, truly epic fail.
